author: USA TODAY Sports - Jack McKessy
title: Jack Leiter, former No. 2 pick in MLB Draft, to make his MLB debut with Rangers Thursday | Flipboard
text: Jack Leiter, former No. 2 pick in MLB Draft, to make his MLB debut with Rangers Thursday Jack Leiter, the No. 2 overall pick in the 2021 MLB Draft, will make his MLB debut with the Texas Rangers on Thursday, the team announced. Leiter, the son of 19-year MLB veteran Al Leiter, will start Thursday's game against the Detroit Tigers three days before his 24th birthday.
